abstract: Hedge fund filings show that investors like Carl C. Icahn and Douglas A. Hirsch are betting on Blackstone upping its $4.7 billion bid for Dynegy, and may put up a fight if it resists.
snippet: Hedge fund filings show that investors like Carl C. Icahn and Douglas A. Hirsch are betting on Blackstone upping its $4.7 billion bid for Dynegy, and may put up a fight if it resists.
lead_paragraph: Hedge fund filings show that investors like Carl C. Icahn and Douglas A. Hirsch are betting on Blackstone upping its $4.7 billion bid for Dynegy, and may put up a fight if it resists.

headline.main: Icahn’s Stock Buy Suggests Battle for Dynegy
